reviewText: I didn't care for this OVA, so I didn't want to 1-star rate it soley on the fact I disliked it. The dubbing is horrible, and the story line and transitioning makes no sense in the slightest. I still have no clue what even happened after watching this twice. This is definitely something I would say skip the buy to.

I am not going to waste everyone's time reviewing the anime itself. There are other places where you should go for that.

Instead, I am going to describe what this particular DVD release is like. It is absolutely terrible. The dub is included, and the sub works. The sound is great, and the colours are correct.

HOWEVER, THE PICTURE IS SO INTERLACED IT HURTS TO LOOK.

Apparently, somewhere down the line, some idiot interlaced the footage twice, leaving non-removable horizontal artifacts on pretty much every frame.

GOOD NEWS is, from what I gathered, at least one proper DVD release of this OVA does exists. This is not it, sadly.
love it! I watched this anime when I was in high school, and I felt in love with it.

This series is 6 episodes, the story plays backwards. It jumps you into the action, into the story. The characters are all connected and you learn how, and their personal battles with each other, but how the band together to reach a common goal is the real story. Along the way they fight each other each step, trying to destroy each other. The last two episodes are spent showing you how the story came to be. Well done series, unexpected, witty, fun, and action packed, strong female leads. I recommend it, you won't be disappointed.
